Package dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.services

Class BookService

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.orphoros.demo.amalgamlib.services.BookService
  • @Service
public class BookService
extends java.lang.Object
    Book Service

    This class is responsible validating parameters, checking for exceptions and connecting the BookController with the BookRepository.

    This class may throw HTTP status codes in the 400 range if an exception happened.

    HTTP status codes in the 500 range may be thrown as well if an uncaught exception happens.

    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Orphoros
    See Also:
    BookController, BookService, BookRepository

    • Constructor Detail

      • BookService

        public BookService​(BookRepository bookRepository,
                   AuthorRepository authorRepository)
        Main constructor of the BookService class.
        Parameters:
        bookRepository - Repository that belongs to Book
        authorRepository - Repository that belongs to the Author of a book

    • Method Detail

      • getFilteredBooks

        public java.util.List<Book> getFilteredBooks​(java.lang.Long authID,
                                             java.lang.String title,
                                             java.lang.Boolean forKids,
                                             java.lang.Integer publishYear)
        Gives a list of filtered books based on filter parameters

        All parameters are optional for filtering

        Parameters:
        authID - The ID of the author of the book
        title - Keyword to be present in the title (non-case sensitive)
        forKids - Filter on books that are readable by kids as well or not
        publishYear - Publish year of the book
        Returns:
        List of found reviews
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if parameter validation fails

      • getBookByISBN

        public Book getBookByISBN​(java.lang.Long ISBN)
        Finds a Book by its corresponding ID
        Parameters:
        ISBN - ID of the book to find
        Returns:
        Book that belongs to the ISBN
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if the ISBN does not exist in the database
        BadRequestException - if the ISBN is empty or incorrect

      • addNewBook

        public Book addNewBook​(Book b)
        Save a new Book to the database
        Parameters:
        b - Book object to save
        Returns:
        Book object that has been successfully saved
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the book object is not properly formatted
        NotFoundException - if the book's parent author could not be found

      • deleteBook

        public void deleteBook​(java.lang.Long ISBN)
        Delete an existing book from the database
        Parameters:
        ISBN - ID of the existing book to be deleted
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the ISBN is not properly formatted
        NotFoundException - if the ISBN does not exist in the database

      • updateBook

        public Book updateBook​(java.lang.Long ISBN,
                       Book b)
        Update the values of an existing review in the database
        Parameters:
        ISBN - ID of the existing book object
        b - Book object with the updated values (ISBN must be present as well)
        Returns:
        Book object with the new values that has been successfully updated
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if the book object is not properly formatted or the ISBNs are incorrect
        NotFoundException - if the ISBNs or the book's author ID do not exist in the database

      • validateBook

        private void validateBook​(Book b)
        Validates a book object's properties
        Parameters:
        b - Book object to be validated
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if validation failed

      • validateISBN

        private void validateISBN​(java.lang.Long ISBN)
        Validates the format of an ISBN
        Parameters:
        ISBN - ID to be validated
        Throws:
        BadRequestException - if validation failed

      • getBooksByTitleContainingWord

        private java.util.List<Book> getBooksByTitleContainingWord​(java.lang.Long authID,
                                                           java.lang.String titlePart)
        Gives results based on filter parameters.
        Parameters:
        authID - ID of the author (optional, can be null)
        titlePart - Keyword to be present in the title
        Returns:
        List of found Books. An empty list is returned if nothing is found.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        List of found Books. An empty list is returned if nothing is found.
